messages.msgSnippet: We need closeups:)of your pencil board whenever you have the chance:) I want to see adorable PMK Saitou slurpping up that bowl of soba too...so cute...come to
messages.messageBody:
We need closeups:)of your pencil board whenever you have the chance:)
I want to see adorable PMK Saitou slurpping up that bowl of soba
too...so cute...come to think of it noodle dishes are supposed to be
cheap...perhaps S.H. is a penny pincher:)

better

messages.msgSnippet: PMK Sano...doing a strange dance (?) wearing a fundoshi The image is on an auction page on ebay (vcd of PMK)
messages.messageBody:
PMK Sano...doing a strange dance (?) wearing a fundoshi

The image is on an auction page on ebay (vcd of PMK)
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3396138153&category=41676&sspagename=STRK%3AMEBWN%3AIT&rd=1

If the link above doesn't work try:
http://i6.ebayimg.com/03/i/00/bf/e2/b9_1.JPG

If nothing above works search ebay using Item number: 3396138153

messages.subject: Fundoshi
messages.msgSnippet: Oddly enough, my next mini-fic was going to be a parody of our groups (Miburo, SHQ, and SHQ_Spy_Division), focusing on glomping... You can have the guys w/the
messages.messageBody:
Oddly enough, my next mini-fic was going to be a parody of our groups
(Miburo, SHQ, and SHQ_Spy_Division), focusing on glomping...

You can have the guys w/the fundoshi, but _I'm_ going for Mitsu-chan!
(Okita's sister)...lol...she's so kawaii! Especially in the NHK
series, but also in some other depictions of her that I've run into.

--M.
